overview: Long-Lost Pre-Condom Flims, Digitally Re-Mastered And In One Collection. From deep within the Colt vault, these long-lost and never seen gems were just begging to see the light of day. This digitally re-mastered collection of pre-condom classic films represents the Colt vision of all-male erotica... Proof that true Colt man masculinity never grows old.
title: Vault Classics
